changeSet.author: Tarun

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Initial visit", "Follow-up", "Return visit type", "Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "SA, Visit type");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to SA, Visit type

changeSet.author: Tarun

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Fatigue", "Sleep disorder", "Nausea and vomiting", "poor appetite", "Shortness of breath", "Constipation", "Urge Incontinence of Urine", "Dysuria", "Mouth sore", "Abnormal vaginal bleeding", "Postcoital and contact bleeding", "Vaginal odor", "Vaginal discharge", "Dyspareunia", "Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "SA, Signs and symptoms");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to SA, Signs and symptoms

changeSet.author: Tarun
